properties.entry: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_MAIL, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_BIR FROM MEMBER

SELECT mem_id, mem_pass, mem_name, mem_regno1, mem_regno2, to_char(mem_bir, 'yyyy-mm-dd') mem_bir, mem_zip, mem_add1, mem_add2, mem_hometel, mem_comtel, mem_hp, mem_mail, mem_job, mem_like, mem_memorial, to_char(mem_memorialday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') mem_memorialday, mem_mileage, mem_delete FROM member WHERE MEM_ID = ?
